meanings.sent1: The two siblings were nonallelic, coming from different families.
meanings.sent2: The nonallelic cousins had no genetic connection.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a surprise to find out they were nonallelic relatives!
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was nonallelic, like two ships passing in the night.
meanings.sent5: The nonallelic relationship between the two characters added an interesting twist to the story.

meanings.definition: Not occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The nonallelic genes were located far apart on the chromosome.
meanings.sent2: In genetics, nonallelic traits can be inherited independently.
meanings.sent3: The nonallelic chromosomes decided to have a race to see who would reach the end first!
meanings.sent4: The nonallelic genes danced around each other, never quite meeting.
meanings.sent5: The concept of nonallelic traits was illustrated using colorful diagrams in the textbook.
